caption.p: ( A) The alphavirus structure depicting the position of the E protein (E1 and E2 trimers), capsid protein and the genomic RNA. ( B) The genome structure of the alphavirus is represented showing the 5′ and 3′ untranslated regions. Open boxes represent the non-structural proteins (NSP1, NSP2, NSP3 and NSP4) and structural proteins (CP, E3, E2, 6K and E1).
